name: POST_auth-api-key
description:
To get started, submit your API key in the body of your request. api.video returns an access token that is valid for one hour (3600 seconds). A refresh token is also returned. View a [tutorial](https://api.video/blog/tutorials/authentication-tutorial) on authentication.
All tutorials using the [authentication endpoint](https://api.video/blog/endpoints/authenticate)

apiKey.description: Your account API key. You can use your sandbox API key, or you can use your production API key.

$ul: **access_token**: The access token containing security credentials allowing you to acccess the API. The token lasts for one hour.
**expires_in**: Lists the time in seconds when your access token expires. It lasts for one hour.
**refresh_token**: A token you can use to get the next access token when your current access token expires.
**token_type**: The type of token you have. (default: bearer)
